name: DekoBoko
description:
Grow a garden for animals to visit.

There are 17 different flowers to plant. Water them every day, then just wait. Your flowers will bloom over time, and maybe even attract some animals.

Chibi-Totoro can also come by and help grow your garden, just like in the movie! Play a little mini-game, and you'll be rewarded with some magic nuts and seeds to further expand your garden. Reach high into the sky to make your flowers grow faster.

With the right flowers in your garden, familiar faces from various Studio Ghibli movies will also stop by. Try to find them all and fill up your journal!
